ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package vanilla or colored frosting

cookingTips: Bake cake mix according to package directions to ensure even rise and moisture
Frost cupcakes generously and coat with coconut for authentic caterpillar texture and appearance
Arrange frosted, coconut-coated cupcakes in a line and decorate head with candies for fun presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the baker to create a whimsical, child-friendly caterpillar cake using simple ingredients and playful assembly.
